subject: feat: update profile to Jaco Theron and remove tab navigation
body:

- Add three project links: Canva Grid, SyncTone, Repo-Tor
- Remove "Boring CV" / "Cool Story" tab navigation, show CV directly
- Update About component to render code snippets in a styled code block
- Change install button text to "Install as an App"
